tourBios.curYrHigh: Finished T24 with four others at the Mainland China Qualifying Tournament to earn conditional-exempt status for the PGA TOUR China Series' season.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Finished T59 in his first event of the season, the Mission Hills Haikou Open. Shot an even-par 72 on the final day at the Sandbelt Trails Course…After Monday qualifying but missing the cut at the Buick Open in Guangzhou, came back with a T51 at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open, again Monday qualifying to gain entrance into the field Shot 77s in the first and third rounds and 73s in the second and final rounds…Recorded his top finish of the year after Monday qualifying to earn a spot in the field. Had second- and third-round 69s to finish T36 at the Earls Beijing Open in June.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T23rd in 2015 at the Lushan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T9th in Round 3 Scoring Average on the PGA Tour China Series.
